params.sellingTokenAddress: Selling token address (address(0) if native eth currency is used)
New selling token address (address(0) if native eth currency is used)

acceptOrder(uint256,(string,uint256)[]).details: Transfers banner id to msg.sender for provided amount of tokens (if ERC20 - they need to be approved beforehand, if native - they have to be sent to this function)

params.minBuildingsSharesToReceive: Minimum amount of building shares to receive with orders' banner

cancelOrder(uint256).details: Can be called by order owner OR order owner is not banner owner (anyone can cancel order if order is not valid)

createOrder(uint256,address,uint256).details: Creates order for specified amount of tokens

params.sellingTokenAddress: Selling token address (address(0) if native eth currency is used)

modifyOrder(uint256,address,uint256).details: Selling token address, price can be modified; banner id cannot be modified

params.sellingTokenAddress: New selling token address (address(0) if native eth currency is used)

orders.details: Modified when #createOrder or #acceptOrder or #cancelOrder is called

OrderCancelled(uint256).notice: Emitted when #cancelOrder is called (can be emitted when #createOrder is called once again after banner owner is changed)

bannersOrders(uint256).notice: Mapping containing link from banner id to order id

lastOrderId().notice: Lastly created order id (0 if no orders is created)

orders(uint256).notice: Mapping containing order id to related OrderDetails struct

userdoc.notice: Functions related to selling settlements for specific amount of tokens
